A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a huge Star Wars fan\, my whole life- I was looking forward to seeing this movie and it was a massive disappointment. It was very obvious that there was not good communication between the directors and I don’t understand any of the characters motivation. Why is Rey working so hard against the first order? Who is the first order? Why are they evil? What is there motivation? Are they just bad for some reason? Why didn’t Admiral Holdo simply communicate her plan to Poe? The plot was awful. I don’t think they could have made a worse movie. A Force Awakens set up some interesting plot points that The Last Jedi just threw away. I hope the franchise can recovery and make a better movie next time. -a disappointed fan
